name: Steak Sandwich
description: This open-faced steak sandwich is a riff on classic Steak ’n Caesar, replacing traditional Romaine with heart-healthy spinach.

ingredients.name: thick slices bread, toasted or grilled
Montreal Steak Rub or Beef & Steak Seasoning

preparation: Spread toasted bread with steak sauce. Arrange spinach overtop.
Top with steak, then drizzle with Caesar Dressing.
Place sandwiches on plates and top with onion rings, if desired, and Better Than Bacon Topper.

products.name: Montreal Steak Rub
summary: Make it a steak night! Generously rub this low sodium blend on steak to create a beautiful, caramelized crust – or mix it with equal parts oil for a peppery marinade.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Better Than Bacon Topper
summary: Ok, bacon lovers; we see you. We know that bacon made from ‘pinto beans’ has you feeling a kind of way: Skeptical. But trust us, this fan fave does not disappoint and it’s so easy to use. No need to grab a frying pan — just pop the top and shake on the taste of bacon with way less sodium, zero cholesterol, and no artificial flavours or colours (unlike popular brands). These crunchy bites are layered with smoky bacon flavor and are an amazing addition to salads, potatoes, eggs, and more!
